original_text: And Tamar put ashes on her head, and rent her garment of divers colours that was on her, and laid her hand on her head, and went on crying.
korean_text: 다말이 재를 자기의 머리에 덮어쓰고 그의 채색옷을 찢고 손을 머리 위에 얹고 가서 크게 울부짖으니라

sentences.original_text: And Tamar put ashes on her head
and rent her garment of divers colours that was on her
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 입고 있던 여러 색의 옷을 찢고

sentences.original_text: and laid her hand on her head
